solidify.translation[0].definitions[0].d: to become solid or make something solid
solidify.translation[0].definitions[0].e: The volcanic lava solidifies as it cools.
solidify.translation[0].definitions[1].d: to make an agreement, plan, attitude etc more definite and less likely to change
solidify.translation[0].definitions[1].e: The two countries signed a treaty to solidify their alliance.
